Column.name: TEXT
Column.Where: , prob_mas pm, ueb_prob up, ueb_them u where t.massnahme_id = pm.massnahme_id and pm.problem_id = up.problem_id and up.aktiv = 1 and up.ueberschrift_id = u.ueb_id and u.thema_id in (10000,10051,10052,10053,10054,10070,10055,10057,10058,10059,10060,10080,10061,10062,10063,10064,10056,10065,10066,10067,10069,10068,9998,9000)

Column.name: HINWEISE
Column.Where: , prob_mas pm, ueb_prob up, ueb_them u where t.hinweise is not null and show_hinweis = 1 and t.massnahme_id = pm.massnahme_id and pm.problem_id = up.problem_id and up.ueberschrift_id = u.ueb_id and u.thema_id in (10000,10051,10052,10053,10054,10070,10055,10057,10058,10059,10060,10080,10061,10062,10063,10064,10056,10065,10066,10067,10069,10068,9998,9000)

Column.name: PROB_DEF
Column.Where: , ueb_prob up, ueb_them u where t.problem_id = up.problem_id and up.aktiv = 1 and prob_def is not null and up.ueberschrift_id = u.ueb_id and u.thema_id in (10000,10051,10052,10053,10054,10070,10055,10057,10058,10059,10060,10080,10061,10062,10063,10064,10056,10065,10066,10067,10069,10068,9998,9000) and t.problem_id < 1000000

Column.name: EXPLANATION
Column.Where: where t.dlgart_id in (1,2,3,4) and explanation is not null and exists (select 1 from dlg_kurz a where a.dlgteil_id = t.dlgteil_id)

Column.name: INHALT
Column.Where: , dlg_kurz dk, massnahm m, prob_mas pm, ueb_prob up, ueb_them u where t.item_art <> 27 and t.dlgteil_id = dk.dlgteil_id and m.dlgbox_id = dk.dlg_id and m.massnahme_id = pm.massnahme_id and pm.problem_id = up.problem_id and up.aktiv = 1 and up.ueberschrift_id = u.ueb_id and u.thema_id in (10000,10051,10052,10053,10054,10070,10055,10057,10058,10059,10060,10080,10061,10062,10063,10064,10056,10065,10066,10067,10069,10068,9998,9000)

Column.name: INHALT
Column.Where: , dlg_kurz dk, problem p, ueb_prob up, ueb_them u where t.dlgteil_id = dk.dlgteil_id and p.u_dlg_id = dk.dlg_id and p.problem_id = up.problem_id and up.aktiv = 1 and up.ueberschrift_id = u.ueb_id and u.thema_id in (10000,10051,10052,10053,10054,10070,10055,10057,10058,10059,10060,10080,10061,10062,10063,10064,10056,10065,10066,10067,10069,10068,9998,9000) and t.DLGTEIL_ID < 1000000

Column.name: INHALT
Column.Where: , dlg_kurz dk, problem p, ueb_prob up, ueb_them u where t.dlgteil_id = dk.dlgteil_id and p.k_dlg_id = dk.dlg_id and p.problem_id = up.problem_id and up.aktiv = 1 and up.ueberschrift_id = u.ueb_id and u.thema_id in (10000,10051,10052,10053,10054,10070,10055,10057,10058,10059,10060,10080,10061,10062,10063,10064,10056,10065,10066,10067,10069,10068,9998,9000) and t.DLGTEIL_ID < 1000000

Column.name: INHALT
Column.Where: , dlg_kurz dk, problem p, ueb_prob up, ueb_them u where t.dlgteil_id = dk.dlgteil_id and p.r_dlg_id = dk.dlg_id and p.problem_id = up.problem_id and up.aktiv = 1 and up.ueberschrift_id = u.ueb_id and u.thema_id in (10000,10051,10052,10053,10054,10070,10055,10057,10058,10059,10060,10080,10061,10062,10063,10064,10056,10065,10066,10067,10069,10068,9998,9000) and t.DLGTEIL_ID < 1000000

Column.name: TEXT
Column.Where: , mas_ziel mz, prob_mas pm, ueb_prob up, ueb_them u where t.ziel_id = mz.ziel_id and mz.massnahme_id = pm.massnahme_id and pm.problem_id = up.problem_id and up.aktiv = 1 and up.ueberschrift_id = u.ueb_id and u.thema_id in (10000,10051,10052,10053,10054,10070,10055,10057,10058,10059,10060,10080,10061,10062,10063,10064,10056,10065,10066,10067,10069,10068,9998,9000)

Column.name: THEMA
Column.Where: where gebiet_id = 7

Column.name: THEMA
Column.Where: where gebiet_id <> 0 and thema_id <> 9000

Column.name: TEXT
Column.Where: where USEDTYP = 1

Column.name: LONGTEXT
Column.Where: where USEDTYP = 2

Column.name: RTS_TEXT
Column.Where: where RTS_DN like '#11.#1.#2.#1.%'

Column.name: RTS_TEXT
Column.Where: where RTS_DN like '#11.#1.#2.#2.%'

Column.name: RTS_TEXT
Column.Where: where RTS_DN like '#11.#1.#2.#3.%'

Column.name: RTS_TEXT
Column.Where: where RTS_DN like '#11.#1.#2.#4.%'

Column.name: RTS_TEXT
Column.Where: where EDITOR > 0

Table.name: RTS_KEY_VAL
Table.Explain: (select rts_text from rts_keys where rts_id = t.rts_id)

Column.name: KEY_TEXT
Column.Where: where t.RTS_ID in (select rts_id from rts_keys where RTS_DN like '#11.#1.#2.#2.%')

Column.name: KEY_TEXT
Column.Where: where t.RTS_ID in (select rts_id from rts_keys where RTS_DN like '#11.#1.#2.#3.%')

Column.name: KEY_TEXT
Column.Where: where t.RTS_ID in (select rts_id from rts_keys where RTS_DN like '#11.#1.#2.#4.%')

Column.name: KEY_TEXT
Column.Where: where t.RTS_ID in (select rts_id from rts_keys where EDITOR > 0)

Table.name: GR_SCALEN_ELEMENT
Table.Explain: (select first 1 (trim(s.BEZEICHG) || ', ' || trim(sg.TEXT)) from GR_SCALEN_GROUP sg join SCALEN s on (sg.SCALEN_ID = s.SCALEN_ID) where s.scalen_ID = t.scalen_ID and sg.group_id = t.group_id)

Table.name: GR_SCALEN_GROUP
Table.Explain: (select first 1 (trim(s.BEZEICHG) || ', ' || trim(ss.NAME)) from GR_SCALEN_SECTION ss join SCALEN s on (ss.SCALEN_ID = s.SCALEN_ID) where s.scalen_ID = t.scalen_ID and ss.section_id = t.section_id)

Table.name: GR_SCALEN_SECTION
Table.Explain: (select bezeichg from SCALEN where scalen_id = t.scalen_id)

Table.name: SCAL_EINST
Table.Explain: (select bezeichg from SCALEN where scalen_id = t.scalen_id)

Column.name: text
Column.Where: where type_id = 9
